name: FOOD FIGHT!!!
description:
Henry hates eating nutritious foods as he believes that , "You are what you consumed",  he prefers to eat junk food as he thinks it would extend his life and make him feel happy.(Don't believe this) 

Now, nutritious foods are coming after Henry, and the only way he can defend himself is by throwing junk food at them.

Ironic :) 

CAN HENRY SURVIVE???

________________________________________________________

HOW TO PLAY???

Chicken projectiles kill chicken enemies, bread projectiles kill bread enemies, and sugar projectiles kill sugar enemies.

Press the A key to spawn a Bread projectile.

Press the S key to spawn a Sugar projectile;

Press the D key to spawn a Chicken projectile.

________________________________________________________

NOTE FROM THE DEVELOPER:

This is my 4th game jam and am really excited, please rate my game and leave some feedback.

________________________________________________________
